Title: The Three Stooges
Writer: Mike Cerrone, Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly
Actors: Sean Hayes, Will Sasso, Chris Diamantopoulos, Jane Lynch
Plot: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality television show.
Production: Conundrum Entertainment, Charles B. Wessler Entertainment
